tr_quotes.quote: Kırarlar diye hayal kurmaktan vazgeçilmez.
tr_quotes.author: İlhan Berk

tr_quotes.quote: Düşsüz, büyük şey yapılamaz.
tr_quotes.author: E. Rusaw

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatta hep mutlu olursam, hayalini kuracak neyim kalır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hayal gücü, ruhun gözüdür.
tr_quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan dünyada, hayal ettiği kadar vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanın hayatı, insanın hayalidir.
tr_quotes.author: Andre Gide

tr_quotes.quote: Hayal gücüne sahip biri, asla yalnız kalmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Jackson Brown

tr_quotes.quote: Hayal ettiğiniz her şey gerçektir.
tr_quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

tr_quotes.quote: Hiçbir şey ele geçince, hayalde olduğu kadar güzel kalmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Nash

tr_quotes.quote: Hiçbir şey, insanın hayal gücü kadar hür değildir.
tr_quotes.author: David Hume

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatta hep mutlu olursam, hayalini kuracak neyim kalır.
tr_quotes.author: Dostoyevski

tr_quotes.quote: En büyük işler, büyük hayal sahibi insanlarca başarılmıştır.
tr_quotes.author: William Russel

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan dünyada, hayal ettiği müddetçe yaşar.
tr_quotes.author: Yahya Kemal Beyatlı

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanoğlunun yapacakları hayal ettikleri ile sınırlıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

tr_quotes.quote: Hiç düş kırıklığına uğramayanlar, hiç umut beslememiş olanlardır.
tr_quotes.author: Bernard Shaw

tr_quotes.quote: Neysek ve neredeysek oyuzdur; çünkü ilk önce onu hayal etmişizdir.
tr_quotes.author: Donald Curtis

tr_quotes.quote: Gözler az gördüğü, kulaklar az duyduğu ölçüde hayal gücü artar.
tr_quotes.author: Stefan Zweig

tr_quotes.quote: Hayatta mutlu olmayanlar için en tatlı mutluluk hazinesi, hayal kurmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Ziya Gökalp

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanın ruhu felç olmaz, soluk alabiliyorsanız düş de kurabilirsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Jackson Brown

tr_quotes.quote: Düş gücü gerçeklikten kaçmak için değil, onu oluşturmak için kullanılmalıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Colin Wilson

tr_quotes.quote: Bilimdeki her büyük ilerleyiş, hayal gücünün yeni bir atağından ileri gelir.
tr_quotes.author: John Dewey

tr_quotes.quote: Mantık sizi A noktasından B noktasına götürür. Hayal gücü ise her yere.
tr_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

tr_quotes.quote: Hiçbir şeye umut bağlamayan adama ne mutlu; çünkü hiç hayal kırıklığına uğramaz.
tr_quotes.author: Alexander Pope

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan, ancak hayalleriyle yaşar ve biraz yaşamaya başlayınca, hepsini kaybeder.
tr_quotes.author: Voltaire

tr_quotes.quote: Hayali kuvvetli olan ama bilgisi olmayan kimsenin kanatlan vardır, fakat ayaklan yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

tr_quotes.quote: Hayaller tatminsizlikten doğar; her şeyi yerinde olan bir adam hayal kuramaz.
tr_quotes.author: Henry de Montherland

tr_quotes.quote: Büyük şeylerin hayali ile yaşa, hiç olmazsa daha küçük şeyleri yapmak imkânını bulursun.
tr_quotes.author: Jules Bernard

tr_quotes.quote: Dünyanın gördüğü her büyük başarı, önce bir hayaldi, en büyük çınar bir tohumda, en büyük kuş bir yumurtada gizliydi.
tr_quotes.author: James Ailen

tr_quotes.quote: İyi yaşamak için bir sürü hayal kurarız, hayallerimiz gerçekleşmezse, hem bedenimizi hem de ruhumuzu incitiriz.
tr_quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

tr_quotes.quote: Hayal gücü ve espri, güzelden çok kötü şeyle uğraşmakta karlı çıkar, çirkinden çok şey yapılır, güzelden hiçbir şey.
tr_quotes.author: Wolfgang Van Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanoğlunun yapabilecekleri hayal ettikleri ile sınırlıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Düşsüz, büyük şey yapılamaz.
tr_quotes.author: E. Rusaw

tr_quotes.quote: En fakir insan bir kuruşu olmayan değil, bir hayali olmayandır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kendimi ve düşünce yöntemlerimi incelediğimde, bilgiye ulaşabilmek için hayal gücümün diğer yeteneklerimden çok daha önemli olduğu sonucuna varıyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kendilerine ait hiçbir hayali olmayanlar sizinkileri de göremezler.
tr_quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

tr_quotes.quote: Peşinden gidecek cesaretin varsa, bütün hayaller gerçek olabilir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: En sonunda önemli olan, hayatınız içerisindeki yıllar değil, yıllarınız içerisindeki hayattır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bir insanın kalbini ve düşüncelerini anlamak için yapmış olduklarına değil, yapmayı arzuladıklarına bakın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Birçok kez hayaller başlangıçta imkansız görünür, daha sonra olası ve yeterince istekli olunursa, sonunda kaçınılmaz olurlar.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanın hayatı, insanın hayalidir.
tr_quotes.author: Andre Gide

tr_quotes.quote: Hayal gücüne sahip biri, asla yalnız kalmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Jackson Brown

tr_quotes.quote: Hayal ettiğiniz her şey gerçektir.
tr_quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

tr_quotes.quote: Hiçbir şey ele geçince, hayalde olduğu kadar güzel kalmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Nash

tr_quotes.quote: Hayal gücü olmayan toplum yarınsızdır.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas More

tr_quotes.quote: Hayal edebildiğiniz her şey gerçektir.
tr_quotes.author: Picasso

tr_quotes.quote: Şikayet ettiğiniz yaşam, belki de bir başkasının hayalidir.
tr_quotes.author: Tolstoy

tr_quotes.quote: Hayal gücü, ruhun gözüdür.
tr_quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

tr_quotes.quote: Hayallerimiz olmadan yaşayacaksak bitkiden ne farkımız kalır?
tr_quotes.author: Burt Munro

tr_quotes.quote: Hayaller tatminsizlikten doğar;her şeyi yerinde olan bir adam hayal kurmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Henry de Montherlant

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan dünyada, hayal ettiği müddetçe yaşar.
tr_quotes.author: Yahya Kemal Beyatlı

tr_quotes.quote: Hayal ettiğiniz insan olmaya çalışmak içinizdeki insanı harcamaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Kurt Cobain

tr_quotes.quote: Hiçbir şeye sınır koymamalısınız. Ne kadar hayal ederseniz, o kadar ileriye gidebilirsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

en_quotes.quote: You have to dream before your dreams can come true
en_quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

en_quotes.quote: I'm a dreamer. I have to dream and reach for the stars, and if I miss a star then I grab a handful of clouds
en_quotes.author: Mike Tyson

en_quotes.quote: Go out and chase your dreams no matter how crazy it looks
en_quotes.author: Shanice Williams

en_quotes.quote: A city is not gauged by its length and width, but by the broadness of its vision and the height of its dreams
en_quotes.author: Herb Caen

en_quotes.quote: I am just a girl chasing her dreams and having an amazing adventure
en_quotes.author: Madeline Stuart

en_quotes.quote: Believe in yourself, go after your dreams, and don't let anyone put you in a box
en_quotes.author: Daya

en_quotes.quote: Saddle your dreams before you ride em
en_quotes.author: Mary Webb

en_quotes.quote: Dreams are the seeds of change. Nothing ever grows without a seed, and nothing ever changes without a dream
en_quotes.author: Debby Boone

en_quotes.quote: Stay focused, go after your dreams and keep moving toward your goals
en_quotes.author: LL Cool J

en_quotes.quote: I'm just a normal girl who dreams, who fights for what I believe
en_quotes.author: Leila Lopes

en_quotes.quote: Never set limits, go after your dreams, don't be afraid to push the boundaries. And laugh a lot - it's good for you!
en_quotes.author: Paula Radcliffe

en_quotes.quote: Yesterday is but today's memory, and tomorrow is today's dream
en_quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

en_quotes.quote: The dreams and passions stored within hearts are powerful keys which can unlock a wealth of potential
en_quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

en_quotes.quote: I dream of painting and then I paint my dream
en_quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

en_quotes.quote: Follow your dreams. Just make sure to have fun too
en_quotes.author: Chris Brown

en_quotes.quote: It's insecurity that is always chasing you and standing in the way of your dreams
en_quotes.author: Vin Diesel

en_quotes.quote: A heart without dreams is like a bird without feathers
en_quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

en_quotes.quote: Dreams will get you nowhere, a good kick in the pants will take you a long way
en_quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

en_quotes.quote: I do not know whether I was then a man dreaming I was a butterfly, or whether I am now a butterfly dreaming I am a man
en_quotes.author: Zhuangzi

en_quotes.quote: All you need is the desire, passion, and will to fulfil your dreams!
en_quotes.author: Dan Pena

en_quotes.quote: Follow your dreams, believe in yourself and don't give up
en_quotes.author: Rachel Corrie

en_quotes.quote: Great dreams of great dreamers are always transcended
en_quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

en_quotes.quote: We are such stuff as dreams are made on; and our little life is rounded with a sleep
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: Just follow your dreams and be patient
en_quotes.author: Angelique Kerber

en_quotes.quote: Life is short. You've got to live your dreams
en_quotes.author: Tiffany Darwish

en_quotes.quote: Visions are worth fighting for. Why spend your life making someone else's dreams?
en_quotes.author: Tim Burton

en_quotes.quote: Let us keep the dance of rain our fathers kept and tread our dreams beneath the jungle sky
en_quotes.author: Arna Bontemps

en_quotes.quote: I am the underdog, and I want to prove that one can follow one's dreams despite all the flaws and setbacks
en_quotes.author: Winnie Harlow

en_quotes.quote: One of the dreams on my wish list is to spend more time in Thailand
en_quotes.author: Kevin Kwan

en_quotes.quote: You'll be much more successful if you follow your dreams and follow your passions
en_quotes.author: Jay Weatherill

en_quotes.quote: The life of a man consists not in seeing visions and in dreaming dreams, but in active charity and in willing service
en_quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

en_quotes.quote: I'm sick of following my dreams. I'm just going to ask them where they're goin', and hook up with them later
en_quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

en_quotes.quote: Hold fast to dreams For when dreams go Life is a barren field Frozen with snow
en_quotes.author: Langston Hughes

en_quotes.quote: You have to keep going and pursue your dreams
en_quotes.author: Joey King

en_quotes.quote: Dreams can still come true; you need a great deal of energy and determination, and a little bit of luck
en_quotes.author: Stefano Gabbana

en_quotes.quote: We're in the business of selling pleasure. We don't sell handbags or haute couture. We sell dreams
en_quotes.author: Alain Wertheimer

en_quotes.quote: Education is at the heart of achieving your dreams
en_quotes.author: Patrice Motsepe

en_quotes.quote: I have had dreams and I have had nightmares, but I have conquered my nightmares because of my dreams
en_quotes.author: Jonas Salk

en_quotes.quote: Take, if you must, this little bag of dreams, Unloose the cord, and they will wrap you round
en_quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

en_quotes.quote: You keep dreaming big, never put the limit on your dreams, and believe that everything can come true
en_quotes.author: Bianca Balti

en_quotes.quote: Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes
en_quotes.author: Carl Jung

en_quotes.quote: You can plant a dream
en_quotes.author: Anne Campbell

en_quotes.quote: Dreams have only one owner at a time. That's why dreamers are lonely
en_quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

en_quotes.quote: Dream as if you'll live forever. Live as if you'll die today
en_quotes.author: James Dean

en_quotes.quote: You don't have to give up your dreams in order to earn a living - they can go hand in hand
en_quotes.author: Michelle Visage

en_quotes.quote: The world needs dreamers and the world needs doers. But above all, the world needs dreamers who do
en_quotes.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

en_quotes.quote: He was a dreamer, a thinker, a speculative philosopher... or, as his wife would have it, an idiot
en_quotes.author: Douglas Adams

en_quotes.quote: To all, to each, a fair good-night, and pleasing dreams, and slumbers light
en_quotes.author: Walter Scott

en_quotes.quote: In my wildest dreams, I could not have imagined a sweeter life
en_quotes.author: Hugh Hefner

en_quotes.quote: Men are the dreams of a shadow
en_quotes.author: Pindar

en_quotes.quote: Don't give up on your dreams, or your dreams will give up on you
en_quotes.author: John Wooden

en_quotes.quote: I want to show everyone that if you pursue your dreams, they can come true no matter what. That's what I want to do
en_quotes.author: Martin Garrix

en_quotes.quote: Judge of your natural character by what you do in your dreams
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: I always make my dreams into goals
en_quotes.author: DJ Khaled

en_quotes.quote: I am accustomed to sleep and in my dreams to imagine the same things that lunatics imagine when awake
en_quotes.author: Rene Descartes

en_quotes.quote: It isn't a calamity to die with dreams unfulfilled, but it is a calamity not to dream
en_quotes.author: Benjamin E. Mays

en_quotes.quote: I never paint dreams or nightmares. I paint my own reality
en_quotes.author: Frida Kahlo

en_quotes.quote: Strivers achieve what dreamers believe
en_quotes.author: Usher

en_quotes.quote: There are a lot of hours and a lot of sacrifices you have to make to achieve your dreams as a tennis player
en_quotes.author: Ashleigh Barty

en_quotes.quote: You have to know your identity. It's the biggest thing in wanting to pursue creative dreams
en_quotes.author: Lauren Daigle

en_quotes.quote: Life being what it is, one dreams of revenge
en_quotes.author: Paul Gauguin

en_quotes.quote: You can't give up on your dreams
en_quotes.author: Anderson Silva

en_quotes.quote: Believe in and follow your dreams
en_quotes.author: Kristanna Loken

en_quotes.quote: I can't remember any dreams in my life. There's so much strange in real life that it often seems like a dream
en_quotes.author: Tim Burton

en_quotes.quote: To all the kids out there: Follow your dream. Believe in your dream. Because dreams do come true
en_quotes.author: Rickey Henderson

en_quotes.quote: A lot of dreams can turn to nightmares... if you don't really work them
en_quotes.author: Dolly Parton

en_quotes.quote: You have to keep pushing toward those dreams no matter what setbacks happen
en_quotes.author: Anthony Hamilton

en_quotes.quote: You can't tell me that dreams don't come true. My life is proof that they do
en_quotes.author: Fantasia Barrino

en_quotes.quote: I had no dreams of such economic success. You should have fun and not be so weighed down by expectations
en_quotes.author: Sergey Brin

en_quotes.quote: I choose to focus on my work so that I can turn my dreams into reality
en_quotes.author: Urvashi Rautela

en_quotes.quote: Lose your dreams and you might lose your mind
en_quotes.author: Mick Jagger

en_quotes.quote: Dreams are often most profound when they seem the most crazy
en_quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

en_quotes.quote: Take pleasure in your dreams; relish your principles and drape your purest feelings on the heart of a precious lover
en_quotes.author: Giotto di Bondone

en_quotes.quote: Follow your dreams and use your natural-born talents and skills to make this a better world for tomorrow
en_quotes.author: Paul Watson

en_quotes.quote: Ocean is more ancient than the mountains, and freighted with the memories and the dreams of Time
en_quotes.author: H. P. Lovecraft

en_quotes.quote: One of the most adventurous things left us is to go to bed. For no one can lay a hand on our dreams
en_quotes.author: E. V. Lucas

en_quotes.quote: To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream; not only plan, but also believe
en_quotes.author: Anatole France

en_quotes.quote: It takes a lot of courage to show your dreams to someone else
en_quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

en_quotes.quote: The world of men is dreaming, it has gone mad in its sleep, and a snake is strangling it, but it can't wake up
en_quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

en_quotes.quote: Seems like half my anxiety dreams are about airports
en_quotes.author: Lois McMaster Bujold

en_quotes.quote: When you follow your dreams, you encourage other people to follow theirs
en_quotes.author: Nafessa Williams

en_quotes.quote: If your dreams aren't challenging, they're not really a dream
en_quotes.author: Julian Dennison

en_quotes.quote: I never ask a man what his business is, for it never interests me. What I ask him about are his thoughts and dreams
en_quotes.author: H. P. Lovecraft

en_quotes.quote: Take what you can from your dreams, make them as real as anything
en_quotes.author: Dave Matthews

en_quotes.quote: A lot of people do not muster the courage to live their dreams because they are afraid to die
en_quotes.author: Les Brown

en_quotes.quote: Let your dreams outgrow the shoes of your expectations
en_quotes.author: Ryunosuke Satoro

en_quotes.quote: You know, one of my biggest dreams in life is to play a Disney princess
en_quotes.author: Ginnifer Goodwin

en_quotes.quote: I am a dreamer. Seriously, I'm living on another planet
en_quotes.author: Eva Green

en_quotes.quote: I know it sounds corny, but when you follow your dreams, it happens. And if it's music, take it seriously
en_quotes.author: Enrique Iglesias

en_quotes.quote: I'll let you be in my dreams if I can be in yours
en_quotes.author: Bob Dylan

en_quotes.quote: In my dreams I hear again the crash of guns, the rattle of musketry, the strange, mournful mutter of the battlefield
en_quotes.author: Douglas MacArthur

en_quotes.quote: At first, dreams seem impossible, then improbable, and eventually inevitable
en_quotes.author: Christopher Reeve

en_quotes.quote: Job training empowers people to realize their dreams and improve their lives
en_quotes.author: Sylvia Mathews Burwell

en_quotes.quote: Be a dreamer. If you don't know how to dream, you're dead
en_quotes.author: Jim Valvano

en_quotes.quote: In dreams begins responsibility
en_quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

en_quotes.quote: Everyone has their dreams. I don't write my dreams down; they just live inside of me
en_quotes.author: Gracie Gold

en_quotes.quote: It is not true that people stop pursuing dreams because they grow old, they grow old because they stop pursuing dreams
en_quotes.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

en_quotes.quote: You have a responsibility to move your dreams forward, no matter what
en_quotes.author: Amanda Lindhout

en_quotes.quote: My pictures are always part of my thinking, and my emotions, tensions, dreams, desires
en_quotes.author: Ingmar Bergman

en_quotes.quote: My dreams were at once more fantastic and agreeable than my writings
en_quotes.author: Mary Shelley

en_quotes.quote: Within our dreams and aspirations we find our opportunities
en_quotes.author: Sugar Ray Leonard

en_quotes.quote: Women have to summon up courage to fulfill dormant dreams
en_quotes.author: Alice Walker

en_quotes.quote: Dreams come true; without that possibility, nature would not incite us to have them
en_quotes.author: John Updike

en_quotes.quote: A dream is a scripture, and many scriptures are nothing but dreams
en_quotes.author: Umberto Eco

en_quotes.quote: I believe people have to follow their dreams - I did
en_quotes.author: Larry Ellison

en_quotes.quote: Horror, for me, has to involve some sort of fantasy. Horror is something that is in your dreams or your nightmares
en_quotes.author: Cassandra Peterson

en_quotes.quote: I was a great dreamer of day dreams
en_quotes.author: Abraham Cahan

en_quotes.quote: It is one of the blessings of this world that few people see visions and dream dreams
en_quotes.author: Zora Neale Hurston

en_quotes.quote: My life turned out to be beyond my greatest dreams
en_quotes.author: Anthony Hopkins

en_quotes.quote: I had nightmares as a kid. As an adult, I have very prosaic dreams
en_quotes.author: Guillermo del Toro

en_quotes.quote: Practise and practise to make your dreams turn into reality
en_quotes.author: Chanda Kochhar

en_quotes.quote: Old folks have dreams and ambitions too, like everybody else. Don't sit on a couch someplace
en_quotes.author: John Glenn

en_quotes.quote: Only things the dreamers make live on. They are the eternal conquerors
en_quotes.author: Herbert Kaufman

en_quotes.quote: We didn't know how to run a business, but we had dreams and talent
en_quotes.author: Ruth Handler

en_quotes.quote: I always dreamt of being famous, and dreams do come true
en_quotes.author: Sushmita Sen

en_quotes.quote: It has never been my object to record my dreams, just the determination to realize them
en_quotes.author: Man Ray

en_quotes.quote: Dreams are not without meaning wherever thay may come from-from fantasy, from the elements, or from other inspiration
en_quotes.author: Paracelsus

en_quotes.quote: I was not looking for my dreams to interpret my life, but rather for my life to interpret my dreams
en_quotes.author: Susan Sontag

en_quotes.quote: You know, Willie Wonka said it best: we are the makers of dreams, the dreamers of dreams
en_quotes.author: Herb Brooks

en_quotes.quote: Think about how many dreams die with people - if you don't believe in yourself, whatever you're doing is for no reason
en_quotes.author: Bibi Bourelly

en_quotes.quote: My dreams are of water. And my nightmares
en_quotes.author: Siouxsie Sioux

en_quotes.quote: Dreaming or awake, we perceive only events that have meaning to us
en_quotes.author: Jane Roberts

en_quotes.quote: I immediately loved working with flies. They fascinated me and followed me around in my dreams
en_quotes.author: Christiane Nusslein-Volhard

en_quotes.quote: Flying dreams mean that you're doing the right thing with your life
en_quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

en_quotes.quote: You have to have a dream so you can get up in the morning
en_quotes.author: Billy Wilder

en_quotes.quote: Dare to visualize a world in which your most treasured dreams have become true
en_quotes.author: Ralph Marston

en_quotes.quote: Reality is wrong. Dreams are for real
en_quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

en_quotes.quote: No person has the right to rain on your dreams
en_quotes.author: Marian Wright Edelman

en_quotes.quote: Dreams are the touchstones of our character
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes, you follow your dreams. I say to the young people, 'If you have a dream, chase it.'
en_quotes.author: Karl Malone

en_quotes.quote: Follow your intuition, listening to your dreams, your inner voice to guide you
en_quotes.author: Katori Hall

en_quotes.quote: People are never more insecure than when they become obsessed with their fears at the expense of their dreams
en_quotes.author: Norman Cousins

en_quotes.quote: Sleep is the best meditation
en_quotes.author: Dalai Lama

en_quotes.quote: The only thing that comes to a sleeping man is dreams
en_quotes.author: Tupac Shakur

en_quotes.quote: Dreams grow if you grow
en_quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

en_quotes.quote: If you're following your dreams, you're doing something you love and that you believe in yourself for
en_quotes.author: McKayla Maroney

en_quotes.quote: Always wear cute pyjamas to bed, you'll never know who u will meet in your dreams
en_quotes.author: Joel Madden

en_quotes.quote: Oh, I was never a businessman. I was a visionary, a dreamer
en_quotes.author: Jim Bakker

en_quotes.quote: They thought I was a Surrealist, but I wasn't. I never painted dreams. I painted my own reality
en_quotes.author: Frida Kahlo

en_quotes.quote: The most pitiful among men is he who turns his dreams into silver and gold
en_quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

en_quotes.quote: I don't use drugs, my dreams are frightening enough
en_quotes.author: M. C. Escher

en_quotes.quote: My first tattoo is a French proverb, and it says, 'Dream your life, live your dreams.'
en_quotes.author: Ravyn Lenae

en_quotes.quote: When the legends die, the dreams end; there is no more greatness
en_quotes.author: Tecumseh

en_quotes.quote: Do all you can to make your dreams come true
en_quotes.author: Joel Osteen

en_quotes.quote: I just want to be myself and go for my own dreams and goals
en_quotes.author: Natalie du Toit

en_quotes.quote: There is a reason they called it chasing your dreams and not walking after them
en_quotes.author: Shannon Sharpe

en_quotes.quote: It is a lot easier to stay focused and keep your head above water when you are pursuing your ultimate dreams!
en_quotes.author: Maneet Chauhan

en_quotes.quote: Reality seems valueless by comparison with the dreams of fevered imaginations; reality is therefore abandoned
en_quotes.author: Emile Durkheim
